name: QuestLab media
overview:
Yearly, all kinds of BTL activities and events take place in Colombia, whose in their need of surprise and innovate more and more, they have been incorporating, interactive technologies as a part of their production. The amount is still incipient because these technologies result being too expensive to be brought from foreign countries and kind of complicated, when you try to get them by custom development. This is complex and makes that there is no a consolidated response in order to offer this kind of technology in a commercial and structured way nationwide.

QuestLab Media makes available to advertisers different kinds of interactive technologies full of incredible, amazing and creative opportunities, the same way they can be acquired in other countries even with prices that our economy in regarding to advertising can receive with arms wide open. This is the need that our company supplies. On the other hand, this initiative offers to advertisers, advertising agencies, producers and promoters, a Colombian option to innovate in the way they interact in their events with their public and consumers. The EVA that potential consumers will get, from experiences generated by QuestLab Media are:

  1. Brand positioning
  2. Brand awareness
  3. Impact and entertainment
  4. Technological innovation.

In short, QuestLab Media transforms traditional media used in outdoor advertising and BTL activities through the use and integration of technologies of the interactivity industry.
